title: Learn the interpretation of seeing keys in a dream

preview.html: Seeing keys in a dream indicates many distinct things with different meanings that draw attention to them. To know the meanings of seeing keys in a dream, it is not necessary to refer to the opinions of many jurists and dream interpretation scholars to find out their interpretations on this particular topic, in the hope that every person will find what he is looking for. Seeing keys in a dream Keys are considered one of the most important inventions recognized in our world so far, and seeing them It has many connotations whose interpretation varies from one person to another. While a woman who sees keys in her dream indicates that many things will happen that will make her living easier and open many ways to earn a living, which will greatly improve her situation after many years of hardship and little difficulty in Obtained. A bite. Seeing keys in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing keys in a dream with many things mentioned below. If the dreamer sees many keys, this means a lot of money on his way to him, through which he will be able to solve many problems and pay off some of the debts that he suffered from. While a woman who sees keys in her dream interprets her vision that she will be able to obtain a large share of The inheritance of a family member, but unfortunately she will spend it all on something that has no value at all, so she will have to keep an eye on it for what is coming and try as much as possible to control her spending. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write a website About the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing keys in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried woman who sees a key in a dream indicates that she will be able to get a special and excellent husband very soon, who will bring a lot of joy and pleasure to her heart and make her family a lot of happiness. Because they are happy with her after they waited for that beautiful moment for a long time. A girl who sees a lot of keys in her dream interprets this vision as meaning that she will be able to achieve many successes at various levels in her life, such as a successful marriage, great success in her studies, and great success in Obtaining a suitable job opportunity for her. She herself and her qualifications, optimism, and improving her interpretation according to the majority of jurists. Seeing keys in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a new key in her dream indicates that she has something very valuable that she simply did not expect, which may be a new house that she and her family move to or a luxury car that they travel to. In it from one place to another in comfort and happiness as a loving family. While the woman who sees the keys in her dream, this indicates that she will enjoy a lot of food and will enjoy the company of her husband with many special and beautiful things that she has always wanted to have, so (Glory be to Him, Glory be to Him) He provided them With His grace and satisfaction. If the dreamer sees a strange key placed on her table at home, this symbolizes that the stability and peace of mind she enjoys now will not

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of embracing a young child in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Hugging a small child in a dream. Is seeing a small child hugging good or bad? What are the negative meanings of a dream about hugging a young child? What does kissing a young child in a dream symbolize? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a small child embracing an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, according to Ibn Sirin and leading interpretation scholars. Hugging a small child in a dream. Scientists interpreted embracing a small child in a dream as a sign that the dreamer will achieve all his goals and realize his ambitions soon. If the dreamer is a teenager and sees himself hugging a small child in his dream, this is a sign that he will succeed in his studies and soon enroll in the university of his choice. Commentators said that seeing a child hugging a child means that the dreamer will get rid of the worries and sorrow that he suffered in the previous period. If the dreamer is engaged and hugging a small child, this is a sign that the wedding is approaching and that things will go well and he will not face any problems. Embracing the child in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of hugging a small child as an indication that the dreamer will soon obtain a wonderful job opportunity if he Currently unemployed. If the dreamer embraces his son, this means that he is trying hard in his work to provide him with his material needs and secure his future, as he is doing everything in his power to raise him and raise him properly. Not to fail in performing his duties towards him, and Ibn Sirin said that hugging a small child in a dream is a sign of good news that the dreamer will hear soon. If the sick person hugs a small child, this means that he will soon recover and return to the activities and tasks that he stopped during the illness. Unexpectedly, and if the dreamer embraces an unknown child, this symbolizes that he has many friends and has a successful social life. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get Correct Interpretations.Embracing a little girl in a singles dream.Scientists interpret seeing a little girl embracing an only child as a sign that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will bless her in life and fulfill all her desires soon.Commentators said that embracing a little girl in one’s dream means that she will soon be free from stress and sadness. Which were occupying her and she will enjoy a calm and stable life. Embracing a crying child in a lonely dream. Some interpreters believe that embracing a crying young child in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes a feeling of sadness, pain, and her suffering from negative feelings and thoughts that control her. He felt remorse for the mistakes he had committed in the previous period. A married woman hugging a small child in a dream. Scientists interpreted a married woman hugging a small child in a dream and feeling sad as evidence of her dissatisfaction with her married life, her feeling of anger towards her partner, and her desire to divorce him as soon as possible. The commentators said: Seeing a child embraced by a married woman who has never given birth is a sign of the approaching pregnancy and the Lord Almighty

title: Interpretation of dreams to see the witness in a dream and its interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a witness in a dream: Many of us may want to be martyred in our lives and die, may God be pleased with him, and in the best circumstances that God loves. Martyrdom is one of the greatest desires of many people because of its dignity from God Almighty, and the value of martyrdom for God is great, and His resurrection is great. Because God Almighty chose His righteous servants and blessed them with martyrdom and conclusion. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a witness in a dream: A martyr can be considered one of the people who receive the best honors from God Almighty. Seeing a witness in a dream can be considered one of the following signs and symptoms: In this vision, there were indications that the dreamer will walk in The path of knowledge and knowledge. It is also one of the signs that the dreamer is exposed to many problems from the family, and God knows best. Also, seeing the struggle for martyrdom is a sign of goodness and blessing that the dreamer will receive. If the dreamer sees himself visiting the witness, this is one of the signs of the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness in his life. Also, visiting a witness in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from emotional emptiness. While the dreamer who sees that he was martyred shows his status and the goodness that the dreamer enjoys. Also, martyrdom by the dreamer is a sign of success and luck that the dreamer enjoys, and God knows best. See also : Interpretation of a dream about zucchini in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing it crying over the witness. Many of us have a loved one who died and gained the honor of martyrdom, and this is the path that we all hope to reach. He sees in a dream that he is crying as a witness. Many interpretations have been suggested, such as: It arose in the interpretation Crying over a martyr is a sign of good news and happiness. It is also considered a sign of a good relationship between the fortuneteller and those around him. It should be noted that crying is one of the signs of an improvement in the dreamer’s financial condition. He is one of the people who have achieved many successful deeds according to the dreamer. Seeing a witness smiling in a dream is one of the miracles. It is honored by God Almighty to see the smile of the martyr during his death. In that case, seeing a witness smiling in a dream can indicate many indicators, the most important of which are: It is one of the signs of the fulfillment of the fortuneteller’s many wishes in his life. It is also a sign of relief in the dreamer’s distress. It is a sign of the fulfillment of the fortuneteller’s many wishes in his life. It is also a sign of relief in the dreamer’s distress. However, the fortuneteller will be relieved of his worries and his conditions will improve. Seeing a dead person in a dream: Every day we hear a lot of news in which many witnesses stand, and this is seeing a dead person in a dream. The fortuneteller has come up with many interpretations, the most important of which are: It can be considered a sign of the good qualities of the fortuneteller. It is also one of the signs of following The dreamer’s right and justice. It is worth noting that it is a sign of the profit that the fortuneteller will obtain. See also: Interpretation of praying in the cemetery in a dream and its most important meanings according to the most famous interpretation scholars. Seeing a witness in a dream about a man. Many young people may want to obtain martyrdom and defend their homelands with the most precious and valuable, They are sure that God will honor them with this dignity. Seeing the witness in a man’s dream, he stated in his interpretation that: It is one of the signs of happy news in her coming life. It is also a sign of longevity for the pioneer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping and hiding

preview.html: But what are the meanings that the dream of escaping and hiding indicates, and what are the secrets and mysteries that hide us in its aspects, and for more clarification, follow the interpretation of this vision through our translator's website. Interpretation of seeing escaping and hiding in a dream for a single girl Seeing escaping and hiding in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates failure and many failures in her life. Hiding under the bed in a dream is evidence of her reluctance to marry. Covering up in general in the dream of an unmarried woman represents the loss of many opportunities for engagement and marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing escaping in a dream for Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing escaping and hiding in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman hiding in a dream indicates her dissatisfaction with her married life. And whoever leaves her home and hides in a distant place bears many responsibilities. Hiding in a dark and narrow place reflects her bad morals. Interpretation of seeing running and hiding in a dream about a man and its meaning The man who hides his wife from bullets preserves his dignity and preserves her. And whoever hides his parents from the fire is only with them and is ready to take care of them. Hiding in an old and spacious house is evidence that the dreamer Seeking to increase his livelihood. And whoever hides in an old and narrow house may be subjected to unjust injustice by a man of authority. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of escaping with someone you love The meaning of seeing running and hiding in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation Seeing a pregnant woman hiding in a dream means that you will escape the dangers and difficulties of pregnancy. And whoever sees that he is hiding in a narrow corridor suffers from the pains and pains of pregnancy. If she sees in a dream a stranger shooting at her, and she manages to escape from him. It is a sign that her birth ended well. Interpretation of seeing escaping and hiding in a dream for young people and its meaning Seeing him escaping and hiding in a young man's dream means repentance and self-control from sins. And whoever hides in the mosque has many good deeds. If he sees in a dream that he is hiding among the trees, he is chasing and watching others. You may be interested in: Interpretation of a dream of escaping from the police Interpretation of seeing escaping and hiding in a divorced woman's dream Escaping and hiding in a divorced woman's dream is evidence of the many problems and concerns in her life. If she sees her brother hiding in a dream, she needs his support and support. A divorced woman who hides from bullets in a dream is evidence of ignoring her bad words about her. And whoever hides under The bed in her dream is against her family. Interpretation of a dream of hiding and escaping in a narrow place Escaping and hiding in a narrow place in a dream is evidence of many fears and anxieties. The vision also shows that the dreamer is going through a harsh experience, and God knows best. As for the one who fled in fear and hid in a narrow place, he tries to avoid turmoil and his whims. Hiding in a dark place shows a sense of anxiety and tension. Hiding in a narrow corridor in a dream is a sign of bad choices. And whoever hides from his family in a dark place disobeys them and oppresses them. Hiding from strangers and strangers in a dream is evidence of the dreamer's many debts. And whoever hides among the graves is a lot of remembrance and supplication. Interpretation of a dream of hiding under the bed in a dream Seeing yourself hiding under the bed in a dream indicates the death of glory and honor. As in

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the person you love imprisoned in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone you love imprisoned in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing a stranger you love in a dream indicates the collapse of fears and disputes that occur. Also, seeing someone you love in a dream indicates many problems and misfortunes that the dreamer is going through, and they will disappear in the shortest time. And it indicates the arrival of goodness. This vision may also indicate that the dreamer will participate in a new and prestigious job, and it also indicates happiness and the arrival of many means of livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning someone she loves for free. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream someone she loves very much, this indicates the end of Her concerns and excellence in her next life, and God knows best. This vision indicates the arrival of goodness and the many means of life and her joining a new position and high work in which she will succeed and rise to the highest ranks in it. Also, seeing a person she loves and entering into a relationship with him in a dream indicates distinction and success in her life and achieving Many goals and objectives. Also, seeing a stranger and falling in love with him in a dream may indicate her close marriage to this person and marital happiness. Interpretation of a dream about someone she loves being imprisoned for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of seeing someone she loves in a dream, this indicates the collapse of the woman’s worries and also the fulfillment of Her future goals. Also, seeing someone she loves in a dream means that her husband will join her in making a profit from his business, and also that she will keep the married woman’s capital, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married woman dreams of seeing someone she loves in a dream, this indicates an imminent pregnancy. And also happiness and good news. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love being imprisoned for a pregnant woman. Seeing someone you love in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries, happiness, psychological comfort, and the cessation of labor pains, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream and this person is not her husband, as this indicates betrayal, deception and disobedience from his wife. Interpretation of a dream Someone you love is imprisoned for a man. To see a nice man in his dream is to see someone you love imprisoned, this indicates that the worries of the nice man and his short marriage will be removed. Also, to see someone you love imprisoned in a dream may indicate that the man’s worries will disappear and he will join a new, good and worthwhile job. Also, to see someone you love imprisoned in a dream may indicate that the man’s worries will disappear and he will join a new, good and worthwhile job. Seeing someone you love in a dream for married men indicates resolving the disputes that the man and his wife are experiencing and providing good offspring. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing quail in a dream?

preview.html: Hadouta website provides you with an interpretation of seeing the quail, which is a migratory bird, also known as the quail. It is one of the birds that eat and is famous for its delicious and wonderful meat and its many benefits to humans. . In addition to seeing a quail in a complete dream, it is one of the visions that you could have received in the dreams of some people, so we have collected for you, dear in God, what is the interpretation of seeing a quail in a dream, as well as why you dream of quail eggs in a complete dream, as well as the interpretation of a dream about killing A complete quail in a dream is from the books of major scholars, and the interpretation of dreams and visions. Why does a quail dream in a complete dream? The interpretation of seeing a quail in a dream is complete from the visions that indicate wealth in money and indicate a luxurious life. Also, seeing a complete quail in a dream is good news and evidence of That the dreamer will earn a lot of halal money from his art. The presence of quails in a dream, complete and flying in the sky, indicates abundant support and kindness that will dominate the dreamer. To see yourself eating quail meat in a dream means that the dreamer is known to waste money and squander money on small things. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person recovering in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sick person recovering in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing a sick person recovering in a dream will lead to a prolongation of the dreamer’s life and many worries and problems. Also, seeing a sick person recovering in a dream may indicate the death of worries, the death of all diseases, and the happiness and health that the dreamer enjoys. Also, seeing a sick person recovering in a dream indicates the rich livelihood that the dreamer will earn in his trade and also succeed in his work. Interpretation of seeing a sick person recovering in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she sees a sick person recovering, but she is curious, this indicates the collapse of her worries and the fulfillment of her desires. And its goals. Also, seeing a sick person recovering in a dream may indicate the great happiness that the dreamer will have, and it also indicates pleasure and joy. Likewise, seeing a sick person recovering in a dream indicates goodness and happiness and shows the girl that she will hear the good news, God willing. Seeing a sick person recovering may indicate In a dream, it indicates her close marriage to a good girl of high status and value, as well as marital happiness. Interpretation of seeing a sick person recovering in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a vision of a sick person recovering, but a stranger, this means that her goals and ambitions will not be achieved, and God knows best. Seeing a patient recovering It may also indicate the end of problems and worries in the life of this married woman and the end of marital disputes. This vision may also indicate that God will change her situation for the better and based on her gains from the money that she will obtain, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a sick person recovering in a dream for a pregnant woman: To see a woman A pregnant woman in her dream heals a sick person, as this indicates the end of the anxiety to which the pregnant woman is exposed and the disappearance of the pain, and God knows best. Also, seeing the sick person recovering in her dream may indicate an improvement in circumstances and is a sign of comfort and freedom from the pain in which she lives. This vision also shows that she will overcome On many problems and difficulties, and that God will relieve her of her distress and worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a sick person recovering in a dream for a man: To see a nice man in his dream is that he sees the patient recovering, this indicates that he will join a new job that he is trying to reach. Also, seeing a sick person recovering in a dream can It means that something great will be achieved in his future and that he will become a person of knowledge that will benefit people. This vision may also indicate the marriage of a nice man soon, as well as the abundance of sustenance and a lot that he will gain in his next life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and it will A team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin in interpreting a dream about parents’ divorce

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about parents’ divorce: Parental separation is one of the misfortunes that a person can be exposed to in his life, which puts him in a bad psychological state and instability. Leading scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about parents’ divorce: Seeing parents’ divorce in a dream carries with it many indicators and signals that we will present through the following cases: Parents’ divorce in a dream indicates the bad psychological state that the dreamer is going through, which is reflected in his dreams, and he needs To approach God to correct his situation. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his parents are divorced, this symbolizes that his situation will change for the better after a long period of suffering and exhaustion. Interpretation of a dream about parents’ divorce by Ibn Sirin. One of the most prominent scholars who dealt with the interpretation of parents’ divorce in a dream is the scholar Ibn Sirin, so we present It has some interpretations: The divorce of Ibn Sirin’s parents in a dream indicates the outbreak of major disagreements and conflicts in the coming period in the dreamer’s family area. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his father divorced his mother, this symbolizes that he will be exposed to the separation of one of his parents through separation in reality or death, and God forbid, He must seek refuge from this vision. The fortuneteller who sees in a dream the divorce of his parents and feels extreme sadness is news of comfort and relief from the pain that he will experience in his life in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about the divorce of parents for single peopleThe interpretation of the divorce of parents in a dream varies according to the marital status of the dreamer, and the following is the interpretation of the unmarried girl. The married woman who sees this symbol: The unmarried girl who sees in a dream the separation of her parents, indicates that she is going through difficulties and feels sad and in need of helping and caring for her family. If you see an unmarried woman studying the separation of her father from her mother in a dream, this symbolizes her failure on the academic level and difficulty. Achieving the goal that you seek. The divorce of parents in a dream for an unmarried fiancée is evidence of the many problems that will arise between her and her lover, which will lead to the irrevocable cancellation of the engagement. Interpretation of a dream about the divorce of parents for a married woman. A married woman who dreams that her parents are separating is a sign of instability. In her married life and the outbreak of disputes in her family environment in the coming period. If a married woman sees her parents divorcing in a dream, this symbolizes her injustice and the illusion of her rights. Interpretation of a dream about parents’ divorce for a pregnant woman. There are many cases in which the symbol of parents’ divorce appears, especially in a pregnant woman’s dream, as Next: A pregnant woman who sees in a dream the divorce of her parents is a sign that God will give her a healthy child. If a married woman sees in a dream that her mother and father are ending their marriage and divorce and crying, this indicates that she will be exposed to a major health crisis during the birth process, which will put her child’s life in danger. And you should. I seek refuge from this vision. The divorce of parents in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates her husband’s progress at work and a change in their circumstances for the better. Interpretation of a dream about parents’ divorce for a divorced woman if a woman sees rain

title: Interpretation of urine in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of urine in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq, who has many health and psychological problems. We mention through the encyclopedia the interpretation of urine in a dream for single women, married women, and pregnant women, the interpretation of child urine, cleaning the place of urine, and the meaning of seeing a deceased person urinating in a dream. Interpretation of urine in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq, according to the book According to Al-Nabulsi’s dream interpretation, seeing urine means that he is spending money in the wrong place, and it will not benefit him. Wrong decisions, as the interpretation of a dream of urinating in a dream sometimes indicates prohibited money. Interpretation of a dream of urine for a single woman. Ibn Sirin says: Urine in a woman’s dream has many interpretations, which we mention as follows: Urinating on her in a dream indicates freedom from worries and troubles, and it also indicates goodness. And the living that she will suffer in her next life is commanded by God. Not being able to control urine indicates that she is impulsive to make wrong decisions often which leads to regret. If she sees herself urinating milk, it means that her goals and ambitions will be achieved, as evidenced by good character. And her behavior among people. Her urine on the bed in a dream is a good sign that her marriage is approaching. The urine coming out in the form of slow drops symbolizes that he does not give charity and that he has a debt that is difficult to repay. Interpretation of a dream about urine in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Shaheen narrates about the topic of urine in a married woman’s dream with interpretations. We will mention them in the following points: Urinating in a bowl symbolizes saving and collecting money. Urine with a strange color and an unpleasant smell in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is spending her money on something that is useless and useless. The stool accompanying urine expresses gossip and slander practiced by the divine on whomever Around her. Difficulty urinating indicates that the woman is facing problems with her husband or relatives. The pain accompanying urination indicates difficulty in making decisions and making them incorrectly. The symbol of urine in a dream for a pregnant woman. Urine in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes many signs, which are: If he sees that he is urinating On the bed, this is evidence that the time of childbirth is approaching, and that it will be easy and easy with God’s command. Urinating in the toilet symbolizes the problems she is going through with her husband and may indicate divorce. Urinating in an unknown place is a sign of many good things. Interpretation of a child’s urine in a dream: A child’s urine On clothes is a good and blessed dream that conveys good news to whoever sees it, and here is the interpretation of a child urinating in a dream: A child urinating on women’s clothes in a dream indicates the approaching marriage of a righteous man. A child urinating on a married woman’s clothes symbolizes that God Almighty will give birth to her soon. Urinating on a man’s clothes indicates that this man will find a job through which he can earn money and success, and God knows best. Cleaning urine in a dream. Cleaning urine in a dream symbolizes removing worries and problems and changing circumstances from sadness to happiness and from difficulty to relief by God’s command. Interpretation of a dream about a person. A dead person urinates in a dream. Seeing a deceased person urinating in a dream raises doubt and anxiety in the dreamer’s mind. And if the urine comes out...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone’s engagement or engagement in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Engagement in a dream or engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin Engagement, the engagement of a non-Muslim in a dream, who sees that the girl or woman is the one who proposes to him, and sees that he is at an engagement party, to learn more on the Moments website. You can see: Interpretation of the dream of seeing chocolateInterpretation The dream of someone who sees that he is engaged. In this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of the dream of a person who sees that he is engaged. There are many cases of engagement in a dream. If a person dreams that he is engaged to a girl, he knows who is unmarried, beautiful, and has a good description. This indicates that he will get what he wants. Or it is good news of happiness and joy, and as for someone who marries a girl or a girl who is not beautiful, or who hates her neighborhood and does not want her, it is as if he is forced to do so. The interpretation of this is that there are those around him from his family or from work who force him to do something against his will and then he knows that. And whoever sees that He is engaged to a woman who he knows is married, then this indicates that he is asking for something in this world, such as money, position, prestige, or honor, and he does not obtain it. As for someone who is engaged to a woman who is married, widowed, or divorced, he will have what he wants, but after great difficulties in getting it. Life. And whoever marries a girl or girl in his dream, or an unknown woman whom he has never seen before, this indicates that the term is close if it is from the common world. And if he deserves a great position, the interpretation of this is that he obtained the position, power, and state. On earth. Whoever proposes to an adulteress, this is a sin that will be returned to him, and he will also be an adulterer. As for someone who is engaged or married to a strong woman with strong authority, this indicates captivity and imprisonment because the matter is beyond his control. As for whoever married the daughter of the sultan or the daughter of the president and the ruler, he saw those around him Delightful, he drinks wine or gets drunk, or actually marries the daughter of a high-ranking man if he is eligible. For this reason, the supplication of a non-Muslim in a dream. In this paragraph, we are talking about a non-Muslim engaging in a dream, or the interpretation of seeing a dream about engagement, or a person participating in a dream with Ibn Sirin. As for an engaged or married woman to a Jew, it indicates an act that he performs and is guilty of sin due to many sins. As for whoever preaches to a Christian, it is clear that he will work in a job full of turmoil and falsehood. But if he is a Zoroastrian, this means that he entered into a job without religion or that it contained great sins during his work. Whoever sees a girl or woman is one who gets married from a dream that an unmarried girl or girl comes to him. To propose to him or to ask him to marry, and this indicates the coming comfort in his life, the openness of the world to him, and an increase in livelihood and money or happiness, pleasure and work. Whoever sees this at an engagement party. Whoever is at an engagement party for himself or others and is happy with what is going on around him, this indicates that he will receive An order in the world that one strives for. But marriage ceremonies differ from engagement, because marriage ceremonies can indicate sadness, grief, imprisonment, and the like, and God knows best. Interpretation of engagement in a dream In this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of engagement in a dream, and the interpretation of seeing a dream about engagement or A person engaged in a dream with Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of a married girl, according to Ibn Sirin: The engagement of a girl in a dream, if it indicates that
